duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop deep expertise in assigned Salesforce modules, including learning existing architecture, integrations, and automation to support, maintain, and enhance the system.
Become an expert in business processes to develop and improve Salesforce-powered solutions.
Build and maintain custom applications on the SFDC platform, including data models, business logic, user interface, and workflows.
Perform administrator functions such as user management, profiles, roles, permissions, validation rules, and assignment rules.
Provide production support, troubleshooting, and generate release notes.
Perform testing of new functionality and SFDC seasonal releases.
Prepare data files and upload the data to Salesforce.com using data loader and other 3rd party tools.
Create reports in SFDC to meet operational requirements and execute Change Management processes.
Complete regular system audits, preparations for upgrades, and stay current with new features and functionality.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
Salesforce Certifications: Certified Administrator, Advanced Administrator, Platform App Builder
